rooms.description: Spacious living area with large windows oriented east and west for natural light. Incorporates a central open plan layout to encourage social interaction.
Modern kitchen with south-facing windows ensuring ample daylight and ventilation, equipped with an island counter design and integrated appliances.
Large master bedroom with east-facing window for morning light and a private ensuite bathroom. The room also includes an en-suite walk-in closet.
Secondary bedroom with south-west orientation to ensure natural ventilation. Sized appropriately for comfort and privacy.
Additional bedroom designed with north-facing windows to balance light distribution across the residence.
Separate dining area placed adjacent to the living room, featuring a window or balcony facing east for morning brightness.
Quiet study/library zone with abundant natural light from north-facing windows. Includes built-in shelving and comfortable seating.
Dedicated servant's quarters located at the rear (south-west) of the bungalow, ensuring privacy while following local norms.

openings.description: Large glass panels, oriented east and west for maximum daylight. Vastu-compliant placement.
South-facing window ensuring ventilation and adherence to Vastu guidelines.
North-facing windows designed to promote balanced light for study and reading spaces.
